name: Monster's Deck
description:
Monster's Deck is a 2D Top-Down Shooter built around a card system. Escape the laboratory and kill as many people as possible along the way! Use cards to attack your enemies and try not to die!

Resources

Music by Tōru
Font: https://ggbot.itch.io/pixeloid-font
Sounds: https://opengameart.org/content/sfx-the-ultimate-2017-8-bit-mini-pack
Additional Sounds: https://sfxr.me/
Main Character's Sprite: https://0x72.itch.io/pixeldudesmaker
